Welcome

Hello and welcome to the I Hack Stuff web site. I have created this site as a platform to document my ongoing learning and research. By documenting, it allows me to solidfy the knowledge and also helps others. It is also a central place for all my contact information and my basic online presence.

Please check the about section to find out more detailed information.
